text:
Someone have a solution in order to create a "Queue" in workflow?

I have a workflow that copy "content" from a "custom entity" to a related company.
The workflow should "copy" the content if there is no data and should "add" the content if there is data.
The issue is that all the related "custom entities" changes at the same time...the workflows are running at the same time ....and the content is being overridden instead of adding
